text: læa cng raluk thung khna thi phracea khxng cea di tras kæ mla xik ahˌ wa thæcring kha ca hı mi phu thæn khn hnung nı phiphph mla xik ahˌ di thul khun wa phraxngkh ca thrng hı mi khun nı phiphph sung phu thi bxnthalay læa kxkar nxngleuxd nı phiphph kranan hrux thang «thi phwk kha phraxngkh hı khwam brisuththi phrxm dwy kar srrseriy phraxngkh læa theidthun khwam brisuththi nı phraxngkh phraxngkh tras wa thæcring kha ru ying nı sing thi phwk cea miru
